title: Conversion Mechanism - SAFE
description: Sets forth inputs and conversion mechanism of a SAFE

conversion_discount.description: What is the percentage discount available upon conversion, if applicable? (decimal representation - e.g. 0.125 for 12.5%)

conversion_valuation_cap.description: What is the valuation cap (if applicable)?

exit_multiple.description: For cash proceeds calculation during a liquidity event.

conversion_mfn.description: Is this an MFN flavored SAFE?

conversion_timing.description: Should the conversion amount be based on pre or post money capitalization

pre_money_capitalization.description: For the purposes of calculating the conversion, how is pre-money capitalization defined (use the language in the instrument, if possible)?

post_money_capitalization.description: For the purposes of calculating the conversion, how is post-money capitalization defined (use the language in the instrument, if possible)?
